channel.title: celery on Hugo NexT
channel.description: Recent content in celery on Hugo NexT

item.title: Celery笔记
item.description: Getting Started celery is flexible. Almost every part of Celry can be extended or used on its own, Custom pool implementations, serializers, compression schemes, logging, schedulers, consumers, producers, broker transports, and much more. celery中current_app的指向 # main.py from celery import current_app from celery import Celery cel = Celery("lll") cel2 = Celery("bbb")
